street_number.title: Street Number
street_number.description: The number assigned to an address of a city property where the bike rack is located.

street_name.title: Street Name
street_name.description: The name of the street where the bike rack is located.

street_side.title: Street Side
street_side.description: The side of the street the bike rack is located.

skytrain_station_name.title: Skytrain Station Name
skytrain_station_name.description: When this attribute is present, the installed rack is closest to this named SkyTrain station.

bia.title: BIA
bia.description:
Business Improvement Association. When the BIA attribute is present, the named BIA applied to the City for a permit to install the bike rack and the BIA is responsible for maintenance of the bike rack.

CB = Cambie Village
CHTN = Chinatown
CMDR = Commercial Drive
CWD = Collingwood
DBR = Dunbar Village
DVBIA = Downtown
GT = Gastown
HC = Hastings Crossing
HN = Hastings North
KD = Kerrisdale
KT = Kitsilano/4th Av
MP = Mount Pleasant
MRP = Marpole
PGV = Point Grey Village
RBN = Robson
SGV = South Granville
SHL = SouthHill (Fraser St)
STRC = Strathcona
VDR = Victoria Drive
WB = West Broadway
WE = West End
YT = Yaletown

number_of_racks.title: Number of Racks
number_of_racks.description: Number of bike racks at this address

year_installed.title: Year Installed
year_installed.description: The year when the bike rack was installed.
